name: TickPropertiesGaugeOptions

properties.name: tickColor
properties.description: Color of the ticks (used only in the custom preset)
properties.rawdescription: Color of the ticks (used only in the custom preset)

properties.name: tickDistance
properties.description: Distance of the ticks from the center
properties.rawdescription: Distance of the ticks from the center

properties.name: tickDistanceRatio
properties.description: Distance of the ticks from the center as a ratio relative to the axisLineWidth (overrides tickDistance)
properties.rawdescription: Distance of the ticks from the center as a ratio relative to the axisLineWidth (overrides tickDistance)

properties.name: tickLengthRatio
properties.description: Length of the ticks as a ratio relative to the axisLineWidth (overrides tickLength)
properties.rawdescription: Length of the ticks as a ratio relative to the axisLineWidth (overrides tickLength)

description: Properties related to the ticks of the gauge
rawdescription: Properties related to the ticks of the gauge
